## Overview

This scripts folder contains R code and Mplus input files to run all the analyses in the paper. Scripts are organised as follows:

- 00_... Data preparation, mutliple imputation, inverse probability weighting
- 01_... Sibling control models (see also "mplus" directory)
- 02_... Polygenic GxE models
- 03_... Mendelian randomization
- 04_... Negative control analyses
